#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define MAX 100005
ll a[MAX];
ll update[505];
ll cnt[505][MAX];
int main()
{
	ll i,j,k,l,len,m,n,q,t;
	t=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		scanf("%lld",&q);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		}
		len=sqrt(n)+1;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cnt[i/len][a[i]]++;
		}
		ll type,r,x;
		for(j=0;j<q;j++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&type);
			scanf("%lld",&l);
			scanf("%lld",&r);
			scanf("%lld",&x);
			if(type==1)
			{
				for (i=l; i<=r; )
				{
					if (i % len == 0 && i + len - 1 <= r) 
					{
						update[i/len]+=x;
						update[i/len]%=n;
						i+=len;
					}
					else 
					{
						cnt[i/len][a[i]]--;
						cnt[i/len][(a[i]+x)%n]++;
						a[i]+=x;
						a[i]%=n;
						++i;
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
				ll kup=0;
				for (i=l; i<=r; )
				{
					if(i % len == 0 && i + len - 1 <= r) 
					{
						ll temp=update[i/len];
						ll tmp=x-temp;
						if(tmp<0)tmp+=n;
						kup+=cnt[i/len][tmp];
						i+=len;
					}
					else 
					{
						if((a[i]+update[i/len])%n==x)kup++;
						++i;
					}
				}	
				printf("%lld\n", kup);
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
